text: Filfla is a small uninhabited islet south of Malta, and is the most southerly point of the Maltese Archipelago. filflu (or filfluu), a small rocky islet some southwest of Filfla,"Topography and Flora of the Satellite islets surrounding the Maltese Archipelago" - Arnold Sciberras, Jeffrey Sciberras, 2010 has the southernmost point of Malta. ==References== Category:Islands of Malta
title: Filfla
